activities: CollabNet, Inc. is a service provider that provides hosted services for its corporate and commercial customers. The customer uses the CollabNet hosted environment as an online forum to allow its developers and others to develop and improve its own software and related applications.  CollabNet therefore acts as a data processing agent for its customers with respect to any personal information received from the European Union in connection with these hosting activities. CollabNet also obtains personal information from the European Union regarding its public website vistors, as specified in the CollabNet Website Privacy Policy
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
